input.sentences: suzy and her friends all got dressed up to go out .
they may have drank a bit | but they still had fun .
they loved the green apple drinks that the bar served .
they danced all night and had so much fun .
they spent time with all of their friends too !
output.sentences: a group of women are taking pictures smiling together.
a large cup of beer can be seen.
Two of the women are enjoying drinks in martini glasses.
two other women in the group dance together to enjoy themselves.
One of the women sits next to a man at the bar and shows her phone to him.
